rotate_handle.description: Rotate the handle of the USB.

clean_handle.description: Clean the handle of the USB to remove dust.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the USB to remove dust.

press_lid.description: Press the lid of the USB.

clean_usb_body.description: Remove dust from the USB body to ensure proper connection.

clean_whole_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the handle, lid, and body.

rotate_handle_and_press_lid.description: First, rotate the handle and then press the lid.
